parameters.name: SPACECRAFT_EVENT_TIME_YYDOY
parameters.description:
Spacecraft event time year minus 1900
                    and day-of-year (DOY) expressed as a
                    single integer formed by adding DOY
                    to 1000*(year-1900).

parameters.name: SPACECRAFT_EVENT_TIME_HOURS
parameters.description:
Spacecraft event time hours within
                    the current DOY.

parameters.name: SPACECRAFT_EVENT_TIME_SEC
parameters.description:
Spacecraft event time seconds within
                    the current hour.

parameters.name: SPACECRAFT_EVENT_TIME_MSEC
parameters.description:
Spacecraft event time milliseconds
                    within the current second.

parameters.name: RIM
parameters.description:
Count of the corrected spacecraft
                    clock RIM counter, which increments by
                    one (1) every 60 and 2/3 seconds,
                    or 91 minor frames.

parameters.name: MOD91
parameters.description:
Count of the corrected spacecraft
                    clock MOD91 counter, which increments
                    by one (1) every 2/3 second.

parameters.name: RIGHT_ASCENSION
parameters.description:
Right ascension of the instrument
                    boresight direction for the scan 
                    platform.

parameters.name: DECLINATION
parameters.description:
Declination of the instrument
                    boresight direction for the scan 
                    platform.

parameters.name: CONE_ANGLE
parameters.description:
Cone angle of the instrument boresight
                    direction for the scan platform.

parameters.name: CROSS_CONE_ANGLE
parameters.description:
Cross-cone, or clock, angle of the
                    instrument boresight direction for the
                    scan platform.

parameters.name: OPERATION_MODE
parameters.description:
Mode of operation of the PPR
                    instrument;
                    0 - transition mode,
                    1 - cycle mode,
                    2 - PhotoPolarimetry and Photometry
                        (PP/PH) mode,
                    3 - photometry mode,
                    4 - radiometry mode,
                    5 - position select mode.

parameters.name: FILTER_POSITION
parameters.description:
Indicates the filter/retarder wheel
                    position at which the data sample pair
                    SAMPLE_A_DATA and SAMPLE_B_DATA are
                    acquired.

parameters.name: CAL_LAMP_BOOM_SEQUENCE_TAG
parameters.description:
Indicator used both to indicate that
                    either internal or external
                    calibration lamp is on and to serve as
                    a marker that separates data taken on
                    successive s/c spins if boom sequence
                    operation is active.

parameters.name: SAMPLE_A_DATA
parameters.description:
Is the first PP/PH science data sample
                    of the simultaneously obtained pair
                    corresponding to the orthogonal
                    polarization components separated by 
                    the PPR Wollaston prism or a
                    radiometry scene sample.

parameters.name: SAMPLE_B_DATA
parameters.description:
Is the second of the pair of PP/PH
                    science data samples or a science
                    temperature data sample if
                    SAMPLE_A_DATA is radiometry data.

parameters.name: RADIOMETRY_RADIANCE
parameters.description:
The radiometry scene radiance in net
                    data number, specifically, the
                    original detector output in DN,
                    corrected for the contributions to
                    the signal by internal instrument
                    elements and minus the dark level
                    offset.  Should in general be
                    positive, but at low signal levels
                    may be negative owing to instrument
                    noise.  This field is left blank for
                    non-radiometry data samples.
                    The value 1E35 is a flag value
                    indicating that there is no data.

parameters.name: BRIGHTNESS_TEMPERATURE
parameters.description:
The radiometry scene brightness
                    temperature in kelvins (K) converted
                    from the radiometry scene radiance in
                    DN.  If the radiance DN value is
                    negative, the brightness temperature
                    displayed is zero.  Because of the
                    dynamic range of the instrument for
                    radiometry measurements, conversions
                    for temperatures greater than 330 K
                    are not possible, so in such instances
                    the brightness temperature displayed
                    is zero.  This field is left blank
                    for non-radiometry data samples.
                    The value 1E35 is a flag value
                    indicating that there is no data.

parameters.name: INTENSITY
parameters.description:
Polarimetry or photometry scene
                    spectral radiance, or intensity,
                    specifically, the total intensity,
                    or sum of the two orthogonal
                    components minus offsets in data
                    number form without adjustment for
                    instrument gain setting.  This field
                    is left blank for radiometry data
                    samples. The value 1E35 is a flag value
                    indicating that there is no data.

parameters.name: ABSOLUTE_INTENSITY
parameters.description:
Polarimetry or photometry scene
                    spectral radiance, or intensity,
                    specifically, the total intensity in
                    absolute units of watts per square
                    centimeter per steradian per
                    nanometer. This field is left blank
                    for radiometry data samples.
                    The value 1E35 is a flag value
                    indicating that there is no data.

parameters.name: LINEAR_POLARIZATION
parameters.description:
Linear polarization degree in percent.
                    This field is left blank except for
                    data samples acquired at the third
                    filter wheel position of the set of
                    three retarder orientations for a
                    given polarimetry band, i.e., filter
                    wheel positions 5, 11, and 17.
                    The value 1E35 is a flag value
                    indicating that there is no data.

parameters.name: POLARIZATION_DIRECTION
parameters.description:
Linear polarization direction angle in
                    degrees measured relative to the
                    instrument baseplate.  This field is
                    always filled to ensure fixed length
                    records for this data file.  Zero is
                    displayed for records corresponding to
                    filter wheel positions other than 5,
                    11, and 17. The value 1E35 is a flag value
                    indicating that there is no data.
